info.name: относительное выделение
info.description: на экране неравномерные градиенты от черного до красного, нажимая на изображение левой кнопкой мыши можно наблюдать что заливка распространяется только в сторону увеличения красного и прекращает распространение при резком изменении цвета

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 iRes = iResolution.xy;
    vec2 pix = 1.0/iRes;
    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iRes;
    
    float less[6] = float[] (
                            3.,
                            1.,
                            1., 
    
                            100.,  
                            100.,  
                            100.);
                             
    float more[6] = float[] (
                             2.5,  
                             100.,  
                             100., 
    
                             100.,
                             100.,
                             100.);
                             
    bool fl[12] = bool[] (
                             false,  
                             true,  
                             true, 
    
                             true,
                             true,
                             true,
                             
                             true,  
                             true,  
                             true, 
    
                             true,
                             true,
                             true);                         
    
    vec4 texColor = texture(iChannel1,uv); 
    
    fragColor = texColor;
    
    #define Chk_more(Chan,a,b) texture(Chan,vec2(uv.x + a*pix.x,uv.y + b*pix.y))
    
     
    if(
    
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[0]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[0] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[1]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[2]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[1] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[3]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[4]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (texture(iChannel0,uv)[2] - Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[5]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. < more[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[0+6]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. > -less[0] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[0] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[0])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[1+6]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. < more[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[2+6]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. > -less[1] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[1] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[1])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[3+6]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. < more[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. > -0.001) || 
    fl[4+6]) &&
    //##########################################################################################
    (
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,-1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,-1.).xyz)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 0.,1.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 0.,1.).xyz)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1, 1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0, 1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    
    (Chk_more(iChannel1,-1.,0.).b > 0.99 &&
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. > -less[2] + .1 && 
    (rgb2hsv(texture(iChannel0,uv).xyz)[2] - rgb2hsv(Chk_more(iChannel0,-1.,0.).xyz)[2])*255. < 0.001) || 
    fl[5+6]) &&
    
    true)

    fragColor = vec4(0,0,1,1);
    
    if(abs(iMouse.x - fragCoord.x - 0.5) < 0.6 && abs(iMouse.y - fragCoord.y - 0.5) < 0.6)
    fragColor = vec4(0,0,1,1);
    
    
}
renderpass.name: Buffer B
Common
